title: Wireless Headphones
description: Noise-canceling wireless headphones with 20 hours of battery life and high-fidelity sound.

title: Smartphone Stand
description: Adjustable aluminum stand for smartphones and tablets, compatible with devices up to 12 inches.

title: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with a waterproof design, up to 10 hours of playtime, and enhanced bass.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: Lightweight fitness tracker with heart rate monitor, sleep tracking, and step counter.

title: LED Desk Lamp
description: Dimmable LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature, ideal for reading and studying.
